txt: Reduce the taxation of digital marketplace payments for residents from 5% to 1.5%.

One, we dont want anymore taxes aside from the ones already imposed on us.2, we dont want ecolevy taxes, we want climate finance grants.

No more taxes.
It is so unfortunate that they want to tax imported sanitary towels. Most of what we have in Kenya is not up to par.

The tax rates especially VAT should go back to normal 10%from16% rating because now there is little or no profit

Thanks
